sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The Pine package contains pine, pico, pilot, imapd, ipop2d, ipop3d, mtest, rpload and rpdump.

sect3.title: pine
sect3.para: pine is the Pine mail user agent.

sect3.title: pico
sect3.para: pico is a stand-alone editor, similar to the Pine internal message composer.

sect3.title: pilot
sect3.para: pilot is a file and directory navigator and browser.

sect3.title: imapd
sect3.para: imapd is the IMAP server daemon.

sect3.title: ipop2d
sect3.para: ipop2d is an IMAP to POP2 conversion server.

sect3.title: ipop3d
sect3.para: ipop3d is an IMAP to POP3 conversion server.

sect3.title: mtest
sect3.para: mtest is a minimal IMAP mail user agent, used for debugging.

sect3.title: rpload
sect3.para: rpload is the Pine remote data utility, used to convert local Pine configuration files or address books into remote configurations or address books.

sect3.title: rpdump
sect3.para: rpdump is used to copy data from remote Pine configuration files or address books into a local file.
